and Division 01 Specification Sections, apply to this Section.

children.title: A.
children.content: Install listed components in a manner complying with the listing.

children.title: B.
children.content:
Install draft inducer fans in single-wall vent section that is designed to couple with other vent
materials.

children.title: C.
children.content:
Secure draft inducer fans to appliances, breechings, or stacks with hardware compatible with
connected materials.

children.title: D.
children.content: Install draft inducer fans with clearances for service and maintenance.

children.title: E.
children.content:
Install[ PVC] intake duct that is sized according to manufacturer's written instructions.
Copyright 2013 AIA

children.title: A.
children.content: Ground equipment according to Section 260526 "Grounding and Bonding for Electrical Systems."

children.title: B.
children.content:
Connect wiring according to Section 260519 "Low-Voltage Electrical Power Conductors and
Cables."
